QuestData.Title: Araj the Summoner
QuestData.Description: With the animus destroyed, the next logical step is to take out Araj himself, and to take a shard of his phylactery. You've probably already seen him, lurking at the fountain in the center of town.$b$bTake my grenades with you. They won't do anything to Araj, but if he decides to summon any of those skeletons, you can use them to blow them away. Again.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Remember, use my grenades to take care of his skeletons!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill Araj the Summoner. You may use Lang's Hand Grenades to destroy Stickbone Berserkers.
QuestData.CompletionText: Araj is a formidable opponent. Be prepared.
QuestData.RewardText: Araj dead... this is good. That gnome has done his part in winning this war. As have you, $n.
